rpgonline.net.logon

Interface UserServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpLogonServer, HttpsLogonServer, LocalLogonServer, MultiLogonServer, MultiLogonServer.DownServer

    public interface UserServer
    A interface for managing login details.
    Author:
    Tomas
    See Also:
    HttpLogonServer, HttpsLogonServer, LocalLogonServer, MultiLogonServer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  UserServer.LogonStatus
      An enum representing connect status.

    • Method Detail

      • attemptLogon

        UserServer.LogonStatus attemptLogon(java.lang.String login,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        Gets the status of an attempted login.
        Parameters:
        login - The user name/email to connect with.
        password - A valid password.
        Returns:
        A LogonStatus object representing the status of the request.

      • isUp

        boolean isUp()
        Checks if the server is running or if the client can connect to the server.
        Returns:
        true if the server is running. false otherwise.

      • getUserName

        java.lang.String getUserName(long uuid)
        Gets a user name from a UUID.
        Parameters:
        uuid - A user UUID.
        Returns:
        The user's name.

      • getUserUuid

        long getUserUuid(java.lang.String login)
        Gets a UUID from a login.
        Parameters:
        login - A user name/email.
        Returns:
        A valid UUID.

      • getPrivateUuid

        long getPrivateUuid(java.lang.String login,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Gets the private key for this user.
        Parameters:
        login - The user name/email to connect with.
        password - A valid password.
        Returns:
        A valid UUID.

      • isValidPrivateUuid

        boolean isValidPrivateUuid(long uuid,
                           long puuid)
        Checks if a UUID and private UUID is valid
        Parameters:
        uuid - A UUID.
        puuid - A private UUID.
        Returns:
        true if the UUIDs are valid. false otherwise.
